title: New AP item (making a AP counterpart to Deaths Dance) No name yet
body:
(Melee Only!!!!!)
Hextex Revolver (1200) + Fiendish codex (900) + Aether Whisp (850) = NEW ITEM (combine cost 550 or 450 Total (3400 - 3500)
+105 AP
10% CD
5% MS
UNIQUE Passive: Dealing Magical damage heals for 15% of the damage dealt. This is 33% as effective for Area of Effect damage.
UNIQUE Passive: 30% of damage taken is dealt as a Bleed effect over 3 seconds instead 
OR 
UNIQUE Passive: On hit damage from the Hextex Revolver

Let me know what you think!

replies.body:
So...{{champion:8}} will be literally unkillable with this item?

{{champion:82}}, too. And {{champion:25}}.

You absolutely *need* to make it mutually exclusive with Gunblade. Beyond just the normal disincentivizing of Hextech-exclusive passives, they need to be like the Hydras - never able to be bought at the same time. And that just stops Akali, Morde, and Kat from abusing it. You don't actually stop Vlad, then.

Spellvamp is no longer a thing solely because Vlad exists. He's busted as fuck when it does exist, so it's not allowed to exist.

Of course there is oversight on the champs listed although with Morgonna would not be unkillable Vlad might be, but that is also a reason vlad might need some interesting changes to fix this, but I do not believe all champs should suffer because of vlad. Another thing they could do is make it Melee Champs only which would fix most except Morde.

Ok first off this is the beginning concept and I trying to add Items for AP Bruisers and Assassin's since there is no real items like this for them. Why is it ok for Graves to have Deaths Dance and get healing from all physical damage, but say Diana and Rumble cannot from AP. This makes no sense instead of just down voting my post why not start a conversation about it. AP Itemization is terrible and there is not enough Diversity for the different kinds of AP champs Especially AP assassins. There is like 2 items that seem like AP Assassin items vs the amount of items for AD champs.
This plus Gunblade on Vlad would make his healing completely insane
